article_title: A Different Twist On Cash Management

article_metadata.description: It feels like heresy to suggest that life insurance serves a purpose beyond the protection of families. We’ve all seen examples where life insurance was a decision made during life that saved the financial fabric of the family after the death of a bread winner. We should recognize, however, that life [...]
